Book Design

While at FastPencil I had the opportunity to work with many talented authors on their book projects. We'd start with a kick-off meeting to go over the story and to get a vibe for what they were looking for. Next I'd start creating some design options and iterating based on feedback until we were satisfied. It was truly gratifying to help bring the authors' creations to life.

Reach out to chat about your next book project!
